firstHalf: At least one goal in first half
analysis: Arsenal is dominating the Premier League race and plays at home with full squad available. Fulham struggles defensively away from home, making Arsenal a strong favorite.
Both teams are mid-table and close in form. Expect a tactical match with limited chances, especially in the first half. Set pieces might be decisive.
Manchester United is pushing for Champions League spots and needs a solid win. Nottingham has struggled against top-6 teams this season. Expect United to dominate possession.
Cup semifinal with high stakes. Real Madrid has depth and home advantage, but Sociedad's disciplined play could keep it tight. Expect Madrid to score first and manage the game.
Huge mismatch in French Cup semi. PSG will rotate slightly but still field top attackers. Dunkerque may struggle to contain them. Expect goals in both halves.
